title: ComparatorOnlyEvidence: Treatment with opioids without bariatric surgery (Control Group) in JAMA 2018 Norwegian cohort study
description: Risk of Treatment with opioids in control group was 15.8%.

variableDefinition.description: Cohort study with baseline data of exposures from November 2005 through July 2010 and follow-up data from 2006 until death or through December 2015 at a tertiary care outpatient center, Vestfold Hospital Trust, Norway. Consecutive treatment-seeking adult patients (n = 2109) with severe obesity assessed (221 patients excluded and 1888 patients included). -- Comparator Group assigned to no bariatric surgery (specialized medical treatment without bariatric surgery (control group))
